attributes.action: For chewing gum to be legally allowed in schools
attributes.additional_details: Because there is technically nothing wrong with chewing gum. It is a very good way to relieve stress and freshen breath.
attributes.background: To make chewing gum legal in schools

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about behaviour policies in schools, including whether to allow chewing gum, are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
